name: University of Tulsa CSG 1003: Game Design Challenge 04:Core Set Overdrive
name_original: University of Tulsa CSG 1003: Game Design Challenge 04:Core Set Overdrive
description:
Welcome to Core Set Overdrive, an endless 2d/3d platformer whose goal is to collect the most credits in each run.

to play the game you need to download the file.

once you completed the step of downloading you are immediately dropped into the game. to survive you need to avoid obstacles, so press your space bar to jump.
